flavor: There was a certain schadenfreude about throwing away your credits.
printed_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may spend X[credit]. If you do, the Corp loses X[credit]. If you spent credits, take 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may spend X credits. If you do, the Corp loses X credits. If you spent credits, take 1 tag.

flavor: It's easier to spend when it's not your money.
printed_text:
When you install this resource, load 16[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
[click]: Take 4[credit] from this resource.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this resource, load 16 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 4 credits from this resource.

flavor: T-minus 13 seconds. Leela had to work fast. She jacked in the mesa wire and activated the screen. 7 seconds. The internal SLD was still booting. 4 seconds. The interface flickered to life with an orange glow. 2 seconds. With a tap of a finger she was in.
printed_text: Expose up to 2 cards.
stripped_printed_text: Expose up to 2 cards.

flavor: CyberSolutions' e3 line of implants trade strictly in muscle memory and autonomic responses, freeing the brain to focus entirely on cerebral tasks.
printed_text: Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1[credit] to break 1 subroutine on that ice.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1 credit to break 1 subroutine on that ice.

printed_text:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit during traces.
Gain 1[credit] whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.
stripped_printed_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit during traces. Gain 1 credit whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.

flavor: When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.
printed_text:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

flavor: "If your snowball gets big enough, you can make it into a snowman!" -Chaos Theory
printed_text: Interface â†’ 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever you use this program to break a subroutine, this program gets +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. Whenever you use this program to break a subroutine, this program gets +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

printed_text: +1[mu], +1[link]
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu, +1 link

flavor: The key to the future lies in the past.
printed_text: The trash cost of all installed cards is increased by 1.
stripped_printed_text: The trash cost of all installed cards is increased by 1.

printed_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack.

printed_text: The Runner cannot run on remote servers. Ignore this ability until the end of the turn whenever the Runner runs on a central server.
stripped_printed_text: The Runner cannot run on remote servers. Ignore this ability until the end of the turn whenever the Runner runs on a central server.

printed_text:
While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this agenda anywhere except in Archives, do 2 net damage.
As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 2[credit].
stripped_printed_text: While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this agenda anywhere except in Archives, do 2 net damage. As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 2 credits.

printed_text: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.
stripped_printed_text: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.

flavor: Peace and violence. Both must lead to the same place.
printed_text: [subroutine] For the remainder of this run, each piece of ice encountered except Sensei gains "[subroutine] End the run" after all its other subroutines.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine For the remainder of this run, each piece of ice encountered except Sensei gains "Subroutine End the run" after all its other subroutines.

flavor: Looking out for your interests since 1984.
printed_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Give the Runner 2 tags.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Give the Runner 2 tags.

flavor: Clones whisper of ChiLo as a promised land of freedom.
printed_text: Whenever there is a successful trace during a run on this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever there is a successful trace during a run on this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 region per server.

printed_text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Trace[2]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware with an install cost of X or less, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Trace[2]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware with an install cost of X or less, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.

printed_text: Whenever you install a piece of ice protecting this server, you may immediately rez it, lowering its rez cost by 3. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you install a piece of ice protecting this server, you may immediately rez it, lowering its rez cost by 3. Limit 1 region per server.

printed_text: When you score Executive Retreat, place 1 agenda counter on it and shuffle HQ into R&D. [click], hosted agenda counter: Draw 5 cards.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Executive Retreat, place 1 agenda counter on it and shuffle HQ into R&D. click, hosted agenda counter: Draw 5 cards.

flavor: No contract. Just a handshake and a fistful of C-6 high explosives.
printed_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash up to 2 resources.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Trash up to 2 resources.
